name: Monster Stalker: Prologue
description:
Monster Stalker: Prologue is a free independent version of Monster Stalker. Prologue tells the early stage story of Monster Stalker. Aliens invade earth and a lot of monsters are coming. You will go fight and save earth! The game combines card battle and RPG. You will build deck, fight various monsters and get skill points, upgrade skill tree and get new cards. Later new teammate with different card color and play strategy will join you. Wish you enjoy fighting monsters and getting stronger!


Game Features
This Prologue includes:
The early stage story
80+ cards with various features
16 challenging battle (+1 hidden battle)
8+ deck build strategies
2 roles to play (the second role will join later)
1.5+ hours gameplay time
